p: The T. mastichina essential oil revealed anti-inflammatory activity, being able to inhibit 5-LOX, with an IC 50 of 1084.5 μg/mL, whereas the extracts showed an IC 50 of 66.7 μg/mL. The constituents of the T. mastichina essential oil have also been shown to be as effective as 5-LOX inhibitors, such as 1,8-cineole [ 14]. In another study, a similar IC 50 of 0.73 mg/mL for the T. mastichina essential oil was also reported [ 40].
